A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I had to finally make a RT account just for this. The level of disappointment I felt leaving the theater last night was immense. Too much forced comedy. No pay off for any of the questions opened up by TFA. Irreparable damage to some of the most beloved characters in the whole franchise. \n\nI feel no anticipation for seeing an Episode 9; there's nothing left in this new trilogy for me to look forward to. RIP
